body: -.- I could have bet it is typed with `h`
The comment should change to French :smiley:
I think we should keep these in git repository :smiley:
Remove the debug code when it's finished.

diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+FROM alpine:3.3
+MAINTAINER tobe "tobeg3oogle@gmail.com"
+MAINTAINER Florin Patan "florinpatan@gmail.com"
+
+ARG BINARY_FILE
+
+# DNS stuff
+RUN echo 'hosts: files mdns4_minimal [NOTFOUND=return] dns mdns4' >> /etc/nsswitch.conf
body: Is it necessary for alpine image?

diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+FROM alpine:3.3
+MAINTAINER tobe "tobeg3oogle@gmail.com"
+MAINTAINER Florin Patan "florinpatan@gmail.com"
+
+ARG BINARY_FILE
+
+# DNS stuff
+RUN echo 'hosts: files mdns4_minimal [NOTFOUND=return] dns mdns4' >> /etc/nsswitch.conf
+
+# SSL certs
+RUN apk add --update ca-certificates \
body: And is it necessary for apk?

diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+FROM alpine:3.3
+MAINTAINER tobe "tobeg3oogle@gmail.com"
+MAINTAINER Florin Patan "florinpatan@gmail.com"
+
+ARG BINARY_FILE
+
+# DNS stuff
+RUN echo 'hosts: files mdns4_minimal [NOTFOUND=return] dns mdns4' >> /etc/nsswitch.conf
+
+# SSL certs
+RUN apk add --update ca-certificates \
body: We can skip it for now. This would be useful to allow for ssl connections to binary, so maybe it can be added back when say a self-signed certificate or a user generated certificate will be allowed. I'll update accordingly.

diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+FROM alpine:3.3
+MAINTAINER tobe "tobeg3oogle@gmail.com"
+MAINTAINER Florin Patan "florinpatan@gmail.com"
+
+ARG BINARY_FILE
+
+# DNS stuff
+RUN echo 'hosts: files mdns4_minimal [NOTFOUND=return] dns mdns4' >> /etc/nsswitch.conf
body: Yes, I've seen many recommendation for it. Not sure if it still appllies with the Go only dns resolver.
